661f958e-25c1-4288-893c-053afa08de44.description: The earner of this badge has completed the Associateship of The Malaysian Insurance Institute (AMII) Level 2 or its equivalent. The earner is part of MII’s community of insurance professionals who strive for excellence through lifelong learning and continuous professional development. The earner adheres to the MII Code of Ethics and Conduct and has an active MII membership status.
661f958e-25c1-4288-893c-053afa08de44.name: MII Senior Associate Member

issuer.summary: issued by The Malaysian Insurance Institute

alignments.name: MII Membership Code of Ethics and Conduct (COEC)
alignments.description: Members of The Malaysian Insurance Institute (MII), as described by the Constitution, shall continuously uphold and abide by the ethical principles of COEC that are vital to the achievement of a high standard of professionalism across the insurance industry.

alignments.name: MII Continuous Professional Development
alignments.description: Members of The Malaysian Insurance Institute (MII), as described by the Constitution, shall continuously uphold and abide by the ethical principle of COEC, "Pursuit of Excellence" by meeting the requirements of Continuing Professional Development (CPD).

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully completed Associate of The Malaysian Insurance Institute (AMII) Level 2 program

b4ad572e-9fc7-42c2-ab18-37694665dc44.description: The earner of this badge holds a recognized professional qualification or degree and is engaged or employed in the insurance industry. The earner adheres to the MII Code of Ethics and Conduct and has an active MII membership status.

abcebd25-6d03-45e2-a360-611f30d750de.description: The earner of this badge has completed the Fellowship programme or its equivalent and is engaged or employed in the insurance industry for a minimum of four (4) years. The earner is part of MII’s community of insurance professionals who strive for excellence through lifelong learning and continuous professional development. The earner adheres to the MII Code of Ethics and Conduct and has an active MII membership status.

bbb817ff-cb5d-4071-8509-1cf70408f6a8.description: The earner of this badge is committed to the empowerment of the industry by supporting the development of professionals working in the industry through qualifications, trainings, recognitions, resources, networking events and opportunities that are essential for individual career progression and industry professionalism.

badge_template_activities.title: Annual subscription of MII Institutional Membership and/or sponsorship of employee’s MII Individual Membership
For insurance and financial services sector: All insurance institutions registered or licensed under the Financial Services Act 2013 or regulated by the Labuan Financial Services Authority.
For educational sector: Institutions of Higher Learning, Colleges, Vocational Schools and other institutions recognised by the Ministry of Education (MOE) or Ministry of Higher Education (MOHE).
For other local sector: Other institutions and organisations operating in an insurance related field or in the financial services sector in Malaysia.
For other international sector: Other institutions and organisations operating in an insurance related field or in the financial services sector outside Malaysia.

abed447c-c81e-4f6e-af43-b5d034863e01.description: The earner of this badge is the highly accomplished industry leader, appointed under the terms of the Constitution of MII to control and direct the works which are the matter of interest to MII and its members. The earner adheres to the MII Code of Ethics and Conduct and has an active MII membership status.
abed447c-c81e-4f6e-af43-b5d034863e01.name: MII Board Member
